about_the_game:
When the "Evil Lady" Decides to Turn Over a New Leaf, Who Says Villains Can't Have Their Day?


Ladies and gentlemen, are you ready? Experience the thrill of transforming from a wicked supporting character to the winner of life!

Story Synopsis:

Emily Hartley, once the campus troublemaker-in-chief, has been banished to a solo apartment by her family for her wild antics. Now, you'll take control of this handful's life, guiding her through a glamorous transformation from problem child to star graduate! Trust me, this is way more exciting than pulling all-nighters during exam week!

Character Introductions (Rare Creature Field Guide crossed out):



• Ryan: A prince on the surface, a schemer underneath. Who said the domineering CEO trope was outdated?
• Dante: The athletic star living in his brother's shadow. Tsundere level: ★★★★★
• Gilbert: The cheerful boy with built-in sunshine effects. Sunglasses recommended for viewing that dazzling smile.
• Agnes: The original heroine, bursting with a sense of justice. Friend or foe? That's up to you!
• Alice: Self-proclaimed "Emily's Supervisor". Want to shake her off? Fat chance!
• Nina: The two-faced heiress. Unfathomable, approach with caution!

Super Duper Adorable Growth System:



• Part-time Fun: Baker's apprentice, bookstore clerk, aspiring model, maid café star, or detective's assistant? Each job comes with super cute animations!
• Talent Development: Painting, drama, tennis, studying, dancing - master it all and transform into a talented beauty!
• Club Activities: Ballet, drama, painting, detective work, tennis - campus life in full bloom!
• Leisure Time: Skateboarding cool girl, shopping spree, beauty sleep, gaming sessions - choose your way to relax!

Game Features:

• Multi-Identity Development: Top student, social butterfly, underworld boss, family pride - be whoever you want to be!
• Complex Relationships: Conquer everyone with your charm (or brains)!
• Family Reconciliation: Turn your stern dad into a gentle papa, achievement unlocked!
• Independent Living: First time cooking noodles without blowing up the kitchen? Congratulations, you've grown up!

Holiday Events That'll Make Your Cheeks Hurt from Laughing:

• Flower Festival: Conquer the judges with your "accidentally" burnt pastries in the dessert championship!
• Summer Festival: Push your limits! See if you can scoop up a whole tank of goldfish with one paper net!
• Camping Activity: Summon air conditioning and Wi-Fi with magic in the "Card Survival" game!
• Courage Test: When ghosts fall in love with me?! Encounter all sorts of quirky spirits, from the lovestruck Xiaoqian to the mischievous swordsman. Who says ghosts can't fall in love?

Life's Myriad Endings System:

Bright Endings:
• Family Heir: From problem child to business empire helmsman, who says it's just a fairy tale?
• Tennis Champion: From breaking vases to defeating opponents, the tennis court is your domain!
• Superstar: Actor? Singer? Idol? Model? A nightmare for the indecisive!
• Dance Queen: From stepping on toes to perfect timing, dance steps are your C language!
• Political Rising Star: From campus bully to national leader, just one step away!
• Design Genius: Turning terrible taste into avant-garde fashion, now that's art!
• Detective Beauty: From troublemaker to case solver, the scapegoat expert's successful career change!

Dark Endings:
• Gang Boss: From campus bully to societal menace, what kind of evolution is this?
• Master Scammer: From exam cheating to professional con artist, full skill points but wrong direction!
• Casino Dealer: Sexy dealer, dealing online, now recruiting! From exam cheating to professional level, who says school learning is useless? Warning: May frequently appear in late-night mobile pop-up ads, irresistible to certain balding uncles. Be careful not to become the new generation of internet celebrity, your friends might hit "delete" on your social media ads!

Challenges:

• Turn classmates who once hated you into your devoted fans!
• Make a splash in various campus activities, make everyone worship your talent!
• Successfully unlock each character's heart, gain true friendship or sweet love!

Are you ready? Come and challenge the ultimate task of "from most hated to most popular"! Remember, in this game, you are the protagonist, you are the legend, you are... the brightest star!

PPPPPPS: The game does not guarantee a 180-degree turnaround in real life. If someone tells you that playing this game will let you inherit the family business and find a partner, please call the police immediately!

short_description: "The Villainess Quits" is a multi-ending romance simulation game. As the villainess Emily, handle various problems, alleviate family pressure, and reverse hostile relationships at school. Can Emily become an outstanding graduate and win recognition? Every choice impacts her future.
